mapper.insert: insert into rptpub( id, toolflag, tool_ccolumn, tool_ecolumn, tool_format, tool_gather, tool_title, tool_hsqlid, tool_dsqlid, tool_wsqlid, tool_msqlid, tool_qsqlid, tool_ysqlid, static_rownum, static_ccolumn, static_sql ) values( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toolFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolCColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolEColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolGather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolHSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolDSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolWSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolMSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolQSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toolYSqlId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staticRowNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staticSql,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staticCcolumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update rptpub set toolflag=#{toolFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_ccolumn=#{toolCColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_ecolumn=#{toolEColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_format=#{toolFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_gather=#{toolGather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_title=#{toolTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_hsqlid=#{toolHSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_dsqlid=#{toolDSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_wsqlid=#{toolWSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_msqlid=#{toolMSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_qsqlid=#{toolQSqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tool_ysqlid=#{toolYSqlId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, static_rownum=#{staticRowNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, static_sql=#{staticSql,jdbcType=INTEGER}, static_ccolumn=#{staticCcolumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from rptpub t where t.toolflag=#{toolFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
